titleStmt.title: A true and fuller relation of the battell fought at Stovv in the VVould, March 21. 1645 Between the forces under Sir William Brereton, Coll: Morgan,- and the Lord Ashley. With a catalogue of the prisoners, &c. Sent by a gentleman of credit under Sir William Brereton to some Members of the honorable House of Commons, and by them desi red [sic] to be published.
titleStmt.author: R. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Underhill at the Bible in Wood-street,

notesStmt.note: "A list of the commanders and officers taken in the battell at Stow in the Would, March 21. 1645" has caption title on A3v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
